tasks.task: The person is using a tractor to plow a field.
subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat.
Engage the engine.
Maneuver the tractor to the start of the field.
Adjust the depth of the plow.
Operate the plow mechanism to cut into the soil.
Guide the tractor in a straight path.
Monitor the soil being turned over.
Stop the tractor at the end of the field.

tasks.task: The person is driving a tractor equipped with a播种机 to sow seeds.
subtasks: Align the tractor with the previous row.
Activate the播种机.
Adjust the seed spacing and depth.
Operate the tractor to move forward.
Check the distribution of seeds behind the播种机.
Maneuver around obstacles or turns in the field.

tasks.task: The person is using a combine harvester to harvest crops.
subtasks: Enter the cab of the combine.
Start the engine.
Attach the combine to the header or platform.
Calibrate the threshing mechanism.
Monitor the crop being harvested.
Adjust speed and settings as needed.
Control direction and speed of the combine.
Collect the harvested grain or crops.

tasks.task: The person is performing maintenance on a farming vehicle.
subtasks: Access the underside of the vehicle.
Inspect components for damage or wear.
Lubricate moving parts.
Tighten bolts or nuts.
Check fluid levels and add as necessary.

tasks.task: The person is unloading harvested crops onto a wagon or trailer.
subtasks: Approach the unloading area.
Secure the vehicle to prevent movement.
Open the unloading gate or opening.
Direct the flow of harvested material into the vehicle.
Fill the vehicle to capacity.
Close the unloading gate or cover any open areas.

tasks.task: The person is stacking bales of hay or crop residue.
subtasks: Approach the hay bales.
Lift the bale onto a stacking platform or into a bin.
Arrange the bales in a stable stack.
Secure the stack with netting or ties.

tasks.task: The person is conducting field inspections to check crop health.
subtasks: Walk through the field, observing plants.
Check for pests, diseases, or nutrient deficiencies.
Take note of areas needing attention.

tasks.task: The person is applying fertilizer to the fields.
subtasks: Load the fertilizer into a spreader.
Attach the spreader to the tractor or vehicle.
Calibrate the spreader for the correct application rate.
Operate the spreader while driving through the field.
Monitor the distribution of the fertilizer.

tasks.task: The person is operating a sprayer to apply pesticides or herbicides.
subtasks: Fill the sprayer with the appropriate chemical.
Connect the sprayer to a power source or pump.
Set the nozzle settings for the desired spray pattern.
Drive through the field, directing the spray evenly.
Regulate pressure and flow rate.

tasks.task: The person is erecting fencing or boundary markers in the field.
subtasks: Gather necessary tools or materials.
Measure and mark the placement of posts or stakes.
Dig holes or drive posts into the ground.
Attach wire or mesh to the posts.
Check the tension and stability of the fence.

tasks.task: The person is using a knife or cutter to trim crop residues or vegetation.
subtasks: Approach the area needing trimming.
Operate the cutting mechanism.
Trim the material to the desired height.
Dispose of or collect the removed material.

tasks.task: The person is navigating through the field with a wagon or trailer.
subtasks: Drive the vehicle to the desired location.
Control the speed to avoid overturning.
Adjust path to avoid obstacles.
Make turns with the vehicle.

tasks.task: The person is operating a pivot irrigation system.
subtasks: Enter the center pivot.
Start the motor to move the pivot.
Monitor the pivot's position as it moves across the field.
Adjust the water pressure or flow rate.
Check for any leaks or malfunctions.

tasks.task: The person is planting seedlings using a hand-held planter.
subtasks: Fill the planter boxes with seedlings.
Walk through the field in rows.
Plant the seedlings at the correct spacing.
Water the newly planted seedlings.

tasks.task: The person is using a hay baler to collect the cut grass.
subtasks: Attach the hay gathering mechanism to the baler.
Start the baler and direct it to the cut hay.
Operate the baler to form the hay into bales.
Load the bales onto a trailer or wagon.
Secure the bales to prevent shifting.
